It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family, which is characterized by its succulent leaves and flowering structures. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils, often in arid or semi-arid environments. It produces small, daisy-like flowers that are usually pale yellow or greenish in color.
